exercise-tasks.description: List the names of countries in alphabetical
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT Name FROM Countries
ORDER BY Name ASC;
exercise-tasks.verify-query:
SELECT Name FROM Countries
ORDER BY Name ASC;
exercise-tasks.chatgpt-prompt: Explain why 'SELECT Name FROM Countries ORDER BY Name ASC' returns country names in alphabetical order. How does the ORDER BY clause work? What does ASC mean, and what would happen if it was DESC instead? Why is only the Name column selected here?

exercise-tasks.description: Show the name and population of countries sorted by population from largest to smallest.
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT Name, Population FROM Countries
ORDER BY Population DESC;
exercise-tasks.verify-query:
SELECT Name, Population FROM Countries
ORDER BY Population DESC;
exercise-tasks.chatgpt-prompt: Explain why 'SELECT Name, Population FROM Countries ORDER BY Population DESC' returns countries sorted by population from largest to smallest. How does the ORDER BY clause affect the sorting? What does DESC do, and how would ASC change the result? Why are multiple columns listed after SELECT?

exercise-tasks.description: Return the details of the first 3 countries when ordered alphabetically by region.
exercise-tasks.chatgpt-prompt: Explain why 'SELECT * FROM Countries ORDER BY Region ASC LIMIT 3' returns only the first three countries alphabetically by region. How does ORDER BY combined with ASC determine order? How does LIMIT control the number of rows returned? What is the effect of using '*' in the SELECT clause?

exercise-tasks.description: List the name and population of countries ordered by population (DESC), and for equal populations, order by name (ASC).
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT Name, Population FROM Countries
ORDER BY Population DESC, Name ASC;
exercise-tasks.verify-query:
SELECT Name, Population FROM Countries
ORDER BY Population DESC, Name ASC;
exercise-tasks.chatgpt-prompt: Explain why 'SELECT Name, Population FROM Countries ORDER BY Population DESC, Name ASC' sorts countries first by population descending and then by name ascending for ties. How does the ORDER BY clause handle multiple columns? What is the significance of DESC and ASC here? Why are Name and Population both selected?

exercise-tasks.description: Show the name and population of the largest country by population.
exercise-tasks.chatgpt-prompt: Explain why 'SELECT Name, Population FROM Countries ORDER BY Population DESC LIMIT 1' returns only the country with the largest population. How does ORDER BY combined with DESC determine the highest population first? How does LIMIT 1 restrict the output to a single row? Why are Name and Population included in the SELECT clause?
